title: Is Billie Eilish's song 'Xanny' sad? - Quora

response.answer_text: Nope, this song is about how people do drugs, smoke and drink when they shouldn’t. Billie is recounting a time when she was with her friends who were juuling and drinking and she was confused to see their personalities shrivel away as the got intoxicated. So no, it is a song about her memory, not a sad song. Billie Eilish – ​xanny
